events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible since this was very disappointing.
The issue was classified under the 'Refund' cluster based on keywords such as refund and return used by the customer.
Support agent John M. has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case to ensure proper follow-up.
Hello! I'm John, and I’ll be assisting you with your refund request today. I’m here to help resolve this quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if you still have the item, so we can start processing your refund?
My order number is 458793021. Yes, I still have the package unopened and ready to be returned if necessary.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process immediately and send you a prepaid return label shortly.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and for making the return shipping free of charge.
The refund has been processed successfully and you should see the funds return to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure that your refund was received and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Since the refund has been completed and confirmed, we are now closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey. Your feedback helps us improve our service for future customers.
